name: Superhero Bike Rider Game
description: Welcome to this Hero Bike Rider: Racing Games to enjoy the ultimate adventure of super speed bike simulator games. Lift your bike driving simulator on endless highway elevation. You must have played many car driving and car racing stunt challenge games but we  brings a new idea to climb and race on mega ramps with a bike in these giant mega ramp driving games for kids. This bike race game is specially designed for bike lovers with love and meet all the requirements of extreme car driving simulator and adventure games. Beautiful stunt animation with background music & camera views is designed for different stunts in this Bike racing game.
